pullrequest.title: Beginning the great zprocess migration for remote device support

content.raw: This PR no longer depends on any changes in qtutils, and I am satisfied that the backward compatibility is comprehensive so long as code is importing h5\_lock, which sets the default zprocess ProcessTree and zlock client objects. Merging.
content.html: This PR no longer depends on any changes in qtutils, and I am satisfied that the backward compatibility is comprehensive so long as code is importing h5_lock, which sets the default zprocess ProcessTree and zlock client objects. Merging.
